name: tavily-search
description: Web search and content extraction powered by Tavily API. Supports general search, news, images, academic papers, code repositories, direct answers, content extraction, and batch search.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: tavily_search
toolDefinition.description: Web search and content extraction powered by Tavily API. Supports general search, news, images, academic papers, code repositories, direct answers, content extraction, and batch search. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access (BYOK).

query.description: Search query string (required for search, search_news, search_images, get_answer, search_academic, search_code)

urls.description: Array of URLs to extract content from (required for extract)

queries.description: Array of search queries for batch_search (max 5)

maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 5)

includeDomains.description: Only include results from these domains

includeAnswer.description: Include a direct answer in search results (default: false)

includeRawContent.description: Include raw content in get_answer results (default: false)

days.description: Number of days to look back for news (default: 7)

year.description: Filter academic papers by publication year

language.description: Programming language filter for code search
